value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21705v1", "title": "Abelian fiber spaces and their Tate-Shafarevich twists with sections", "summary": "Starting with an Abelian fiber space, the aim is to construct a\nTate-Shafarevich twist that has a rational section.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG,math.NT", "published": "2025-04-30T14:47:09Z"}
